pages.text: Water vapor is created from water in the $(l:block/rotary_condensentrator)Rotary Condenstrator$(/l).

It is combined with $(l:chemicals/sulfur_trioxide)Sulfur Trioxide$(/l) in the $(l:block/chemical_infuser)Chemical Infuser$(/l) to create $(l:chemicals/sulfuric_acid)Sulfuric Acid$(/l).  It can also be combined with dirt in the $(l:block/chemical_injection_chamber)Chemical Injection Chamber$(/l) to make clay.
